::KitKat::

She heard Drillbit and nodded.  She opened her link,"PAralysis,  we 
could use that help. Like Now!"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit feels the force of the ships explosion, and then sees that 
the
> side of the base is on fire, and pretty much blown away.
> "Shit! KitKat, we need to evacuate. The base isn't going to last, 
much
> longer."
